DOC.detailed_description: Postpartum depression ( PPD ) affect approximately 15 % woman first year give birth , common across culture . In postpartum Chinese woman , report incidence range 6.5 % 29.5 % . The etiology postpartum depression totally clear . Identified risk factor include previous maternal blue , unplanned pregnancy , lack marital social support , previous psychiatric illness . Furthermore , severe pain experience childbirth report associated occurrence postpartum depression . A recent study investigator find use epidural analgesia labor associate decreased risk postpartum depression . However , several limitation exist study evidence need reconfirm finding . The purpose present study reevaluate whether use neuraxial labor analgesia reduce incidence postpartum depression .
